ch.zhaw.hhrt.moodlightreferenceapp

Class RgbwFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ch.zhaw.hhrt.moodlightreferenceapp.RgbwFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class RgbwFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Red-Green-Blue+White view (fragment) of the app. Standard user interface where the brightness of each coloured LED can be adjusted individually by changing the position of the assigned SeekBar.
    Version:
    0.8 date 21.10.2016
    Author:
    Hanspeter Hochreutener, hhrt@zhaw.ch

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

      • receivedData

        public void receivedData(java.lang.String data)
        Change the SeekBar positions according to the received data
        Parameters:
        data - that has been received

      • changeSeekBarListener

        private void changeSeekBarListener(int id,
                                   java.lang.String label)
        Change/register listeners for the SeekBars which change the brightness of the coloured LEDs. This has to be done once, after the view of this fragment has been created. When the user touches a SeekBar, the new position is sent to the Moodlight.
        Parameters:
        id - of the SeekBar
        label - string to be sent to the Moodlight when this SeekBar has been moved

      • setSeekBarPositionFromData

        private void setSeekBarPositionFromData(java.lang.String data)
        Set new position of a SeekBar. The SeekBar and its position are specified in the received String.
        Parameters:
        data - received from the Moodlight
